name: ipynb-translator
description: Translate Jupyter Notebook Markdown cell using LLM and display the result below the original cell.

commands.title: Translate Markdown cell in Jupyter Notebook

notebook/cell/title.title: Translate Markdown cell in Jupyter Notebook

ipynbTranslator.apiKey.markdownDescription: Get your API Key from [Zhipu AI Open Platform](https://open.bigmodel.cn/)

ipynbTranslator.modelName.description: The model name, default is glm-4-flash-250414. Please check the available models on the Zhipu AI Open Platform.

ipynbTranslator.systemPrompt.description: The system prompt for the LLM translation.You can set the target language by changing the system prompt.
ipynbTranslator.systemPrompt.default: 请将以下Markdown文本翻译成中文，只返回翻译后的内容，不要包含任何额外说明或Markdown语法外的字符，为了保持翻译结果语义通顺，你应该恰当地使用意译，而不必与原文的顺序保持严格一致。
ipynbTranslator.systemPrompt.markdownDescription: Customize the system prompt for the large language model. For example: '翻译以下Markdown文本为中文，翻译结果必须保持原有的Markdown语法格式。'

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
